chunks.text:
AI Fields: Your tasks just got a lot smarter
 
AI Fields are like project management magic: set them up once and they'll auto-fill themselves! Plus, you can set them to re-fill as often as you want, so you can get summaries, sentiment, action items, and more—without ever doing the busywork yourself!

chunks.text:
Check out a few of our favorite new AI Fields:
 
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Summary: See a quick snapshot of what's happening in a task.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Progress Update: Get real-time details on how work is progressing.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Categorize: Automatically categorize entire Lists of tasks.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Translate: Translate tasks into any language. Très bien! 非常好!
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Action Items: Immediately identify your next steps.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Effort: Get a quick estimate of how much work a task will take.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/5817aff0-6f8b-4b8e-6696-d16ff62fe21b.png> 	
Custom: Create your own AI Fields to automate whatever work you need to get done!
 
Manually updating each one of your tasks, one at a time? That's so 2024. Add AI Fields to any List in just a couple of clicks and take your productivity to a whole new level! 

What are you waiting for?
